Title: Authorizes the governing body of certain municipal corporations to authorize an extension of exemption applications until such municipality's grievance date for persons sixty-five years of age or older
Summary: Allows a municipality to pass a local resolution to extend the taxable status exemption filing date to match such municipality's grievance date for persons sixty-five years of age or older.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to allowing a municipality to pass a local resolution to extend the taxable status exemption filing date to match such municipality's grievance date; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
